Very fun and cute puzzle game with very interesting puzzle sequences although content is limited and won't take very long to beat. I beat the game in for hours. Still, the game was fun and was worth the money. The cake is a lie.

Okay, okay, we get it, "Ohhh wahhh burning the Companion Cube/Sphere"
No, okay? No. I don't care about that.
It's killing GLaDOS' cores that I found sad. 
Is it because I was exposed to Portal memes for years and years before I finally played it?
Yes. Yes it is. "Hee hee, the cake is a lie, so funny, hEY GUYS, THIS GUY IS MAKING FUN OF OUR CULTURE!!1!"
Anyway, yeah, play this game. I shouldn't have to tell you how great this game is.

Aqui vai a avaliação de um jogador que platinou o jogo.
Bom portal se trata de um jogo de puzzles, apesar de ser muito famoso essa review vai para aqueles que só ouviram falar do jogo, o game em si é destinado a todos os tipos de jogadores, se você busca uma jogatina casual nele você encontrará talvez umas 8 horas de gameplay muito divertida e totalmente imersiva (acredite essas horas vão parecer minutos). Para aqueles jogadores mais "hardcore" que como eu que quer descobrir e fazer tudo que o jogo tem a disposição vai se deparar com 15 horas de gameplay, nesse tempo você vai ficar fascinado em explorar cada centímetro dos mapas para sentir aquele prazer único de encontrar os easter egg que vão aos poucos revelando os mistérios da história, depois de descobrir tudo que há para ser visto ainda haverá longas horas de desafios onde os ranks globais irão fazer você buscar diminuir cada segundo na conclusão de uma fase. Conclusão: o jogo passa uma atmosfera encantadora além de ser muito desafiante, o tempo de jogo para a platina é em torno de 15 horas porém os desafios são entretenimento infinito (ou até você ver seu nome entre os primeiros). O preço é mais do que justo para essa obra de arte digital, pagaria 5 vezes o preço para mais algumas horas de game.

If you love strategy and puzzles. Then this game is right for you.
Fun little puzzle game

this game is an experience. the lack of other charcters outside of glados really makes you feel alone and isolated from anything and anyone. the presentation and atmosphere of this game are about as perfect as can be, I have yet to play a game with a look and feel that portal so expertly crafts and maintains throughout. the mechanics are solid and the story is interesting enough to make you want to keep progressing. i highly reccomend this game to anyone who likes puzzle games and platformers.

If you're anything like me, assuming you know exactly what I am like because you're abilities have finally manifested and your psychic game is turnt up to 11, then you're gonna poop Mega Blocks when you find out that Portal is just as taste-a-licious as the first day your mind was blown discovering that boxes also come in orange. No more dull cardboard browns from then on out and about. If you're not anything like me or maybe just a little like me, then prepare to have your taste buds rocked like a Stone Sour concert that you happened to win V.I.P.  backstage passes to. While even though you don't really dig the band, rest assured knowing that it's still gonna be a day ditching school well spent, munching backstage caterings and getting autographs you can probably sell to buy tickets to a concert you actually want to go to. Hours of head scratching, first person shootin', puzzle solving fun with added comic relief that I will say is def top nachos. But what else would you expect from Valve. Those dudes and dudettes are on a whole 'nother level. Thanks Valve for always bringin' the fun-k.
